永远怀念那个夏天。
对于暴雪系列游戏是没什么兴趣的，但是在那个夏天看完"双龙“，我毫不犹豫的花掉328购买了豪华版，即使当时没什么钱，但后续的游玩让我觉得这个328是我做的最正确的开销，之后的最佳游戏、节日活动、箱子、等一系列活动都在告诉世界它的优秀。
往日想起依旧美好。但是越来越慢的更新、摆烂的暴雪运营、突然的宣告1的死亡、甚至为了2的出生又画了一个无法实现的大饼。
暴雪你真的应该给网易嗑一个，你却选择给国服全体玩家和网之易狠狠的来一刀，愿你好死

I really enjoy playing Overwatch, the game is great at it's core and lots of fun, the constant updates and stuff to do is great in comparison to TF2's only seasonal lootboxes and map, mentally unstable echo chamber of a community aside, but if we compare what OW2 did in comparison to OW1 and the amount of overpriced greedy tactics and downright false marketting I do NOT recommend giving the game a try if you're a new player.
Blizzard clearly became desperate after the AWFUL state the franchise is lately in comparison to earlier years. They would never come to Steam if the game was doing fine. They're hoping to get few more brainrotten poor souls to be willing to scam themselves out of 15/40$ for a 1.5 hour experience we've been getting for free years ago.

# If you really want to play, go ahead, just don't buy anything, but it will be best if you don't play at all if you're a new player

And please you TF2 freaks, it's been 7 years. You're embarrassing yourself at this point by hating on OW for no good reason
这个世界过去，现在还是将来，都不需要守望先锋 草泥马的sb暴雪
尺史都赶不上热乎的，这么长时间过去了还上架一个二手史。

There are too many things to talk about and I do understand why people do negative review bombs, because it left a bad taste in mouth many times. Cosmetic microtransactions that are too expensive and promises that havent been kept ( PvE, Skill Trees, Weapon inspect and all that stuff ), but most or at least some of these happen because of Activision. I think developer team of Overwatch 2 is as amazing as Overwatch 1. Yes, We all miss Jeff Kaplan and the old days, but I still get excited to play the new heros, ( even though they are behind the paywall if you dont grind ) and amazing skins ( even though they are locked behind the paywall, I mean you can get them if you collect weekly coins for a year maybe.. ) but I believe these can be fixed. 

Its a bummer that we didnt get the PvE update WHICH WAS THE REASON WHY Overwatch 1 became 2 but I still think this game offers an unique fun experience. Maybe I just can't give up on the game I loved so much for so long, but for people who havent played yet, give it a try and you won't be disappointed ( until you wanna get skins or try to rank up ), and for people like me who used to love Overwatch or still does, I think there i still something left to love about Overwatch. 

I still have hope, maybe Microsoft changes things and add new people to developer team or change the monetary system.

In the end don't forget,
The world can always use more heroes.
